response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its value to you, we are confident it's worth more than what you might find elsewhere. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity for mutual growth and collaboration between us. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
